ACK.caption: List of latitudes
ACK.doc: Coordinate has to have six digits of precision, for example 55.123456.
ACK.name: list_of_latitudes

ACL.caption: List of longitudes
ACL.doc: Coordinate has to have six digits of precision, for example 55.123456.
ACL.name: list_of_longitudes

ACN.caption: Costing model
ACN.doc: How the route is going to be traversed.
ACN.name: costing_model

ADX.caption: Units
ADX.doc: Distance units for output. Allowable unit types are kilometers and miles. Returned values such as Length will be determined by the Unit selected.
ADX.name: units
